email_subject: Project Elvis and Cactus Open Gas Position
email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 07/13/2000 10:24 AM --------------------------- From: Andy Chen on 07/12/2000 02:14 PM To: Michael Etringer/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Frank W Vickers/HOU/ECT@ECT, Saji John/HOU/ECT@ECT, Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT, John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: Project Elvis and Cactus Open Gas Position Mike-- Here are the net open Socal border positions we have for Elvis and Cactus. Let's try and set up a conference call with Phillip and John to talk about their offers at the back-end of their curves. Roughly speaking, we are looking at a nominal 3750 MMBtu/d for 14 years from May 2010 on Elvis, and 3000 MMBtu/d on Cactus fromJune 2004 to April 2022. Andy
